actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power

official_title: A bill to reform the Federal Power Act to encourage conduit hydroelectric facilities.

summary.text: Conduit Hydroelectric Act of 1981 - Amends the Federal Power Act to exempt conduit hydroelectric facilities (excluding dams or other impoundments and facilities on Federal lands) from the requirements for the development of water power and resources under such Act, including license requirements.

titles.title: A bill to reform the Federal Power Act to encourage conduit hydroelectric facilities.
